model.metadata: CREATE VIEW flight_table ( Id string(4000) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'Id', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Airline string(4000) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'Airline', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), FlightNo double OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'FlightNo', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), SSN string(4000) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'SSN', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), DepartLoc string(4000) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'DepartLoc', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), ArriveLoc string(4000) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'ArriveLoc', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), TravelDate date OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'TravelDate', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT FLIGHT_PK PRIMARY KEY(SSN) ) AS SELECT A.Id, A.Airline, A.FlightNo, A.SSN, A.DepartLoc, A.ArriveLoc, A.TravelDate FROM (EXEC flight_source.getTextFiles('flight-data.txt')) AS f, TEXTTABLE(file COLUMNS Id string, Airline string, FlightNo double, SSN string, DepartLoc string, ArriveLoc string, TravelDate date HEADER) AS A;

model.metadata: CREATE VIEW criminal_table ( Name string(4000) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), SSN string(4000) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Felonies double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), YearsIncarcerated double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Fingerprints string(4000) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), EyeColor string(4000) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Nationality string(4000) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), DOB date OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Id string(4000) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Airline string(4000) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), FlightNo double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), DepartLoc string(4000) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), ArriveLoc string(4000) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), TravelDate date OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE') ) AS SELECT criminal_view.criminal_table.Name, criminal_view.criminal_table.SSN, criminal_view.criminal_table.Felonies, criminal_view.criminal_table.YearsIncarcerated, criminal_view.criminal_table.Fingerprints, criminal_view.criminal_table.EyeColor, person_view.person_table.Nationality, person_view.person_table.DOB, flight_view.flight_table.Id, flight_view.flight_table.Airline, flight_view.flight_table.FlightNo, flight_view.flight_table.DepartLoc, flight_view.flight_table.ArriveLoc, flight_view.flight_table.TravelDate FROM criminal_view.criminal_table, person_view.person_table, flight_view.flight_table WHERE (criminal_view.criminal_table.SSN = flight_view.flight_table.SSN) AND (criminal_view.criminal_table.SSN = person_view.person_table.SSN) AND (person_view.person_table.SSN = flight_view.flight_table.SSN) AND (criminal_view.criminal_table.Name = person_view.person_table.Name);
